about_the_game:
Drunk or Dead is an unusual and captivating game that combines elements of a shooter and survival in an apocalyptic setting, adding the original mechanic of using alcohol as a crucial in-game resource. In the game, the player finds themselves in a world plagued by a zombie apocalypse, where they must fight hordes of the undead. However, the game has a twist: the player can use alcohol as a resource for survival.

The game offers players various types of weapons, such as pistols, rifles, and more. Various events and missions allow players to gradually uncover the history of the game world, revealing new aspects and plot twists. If you enjoy shooters and want to experience an unforgettable gaming process based on original mechanics, Drunk or Dead could be an ideal option for your entertainment. Maintaining combat readiness while controlling the level of intoxication adds a strategic element to the game, requiring players to balance between fun and efficiency in battle.

* Shoot! Hit! Blow up! - stand against bloodthirsty enemies at any price!
* Drink! Drink! Drink! - in this game, alcohol is not only harmful but useful too!
* Walk through the line of a riveting plot to discover locations to dare your friends in survival mode.
* Become the best killer of undead among your friends or worldwide, if everything mentioned above isn't enough for you.


The game is developed with a focus on virtual reality (VR), allowing players to immerse themselves more realistically in the tense atmosphere of the zombie apocalypse. The main gameplay involves defending the shelter from incoming waves of zombies, with the player needing to control their level of intoxication to maintain combat effectiveness. This is a comedic game that should not be taken too seriously. Just enjoy the process.

About the Game

Drunk or Dead is an unusual and captivating game that combines elements of a shooter and survival in an apocalyptic setting, adding the original mechanic of using alcohol as a crucial in-game resource. In the game, the player finds themselves in a world plagued by a zombie apocalypse, where they must fight hordes of the undead. However, the game has a twist: the player can use alcohol as a resource for survival.

The game offers players various types of weapons, such as pistols, rifles, and more. Various events and missions allow players to gradually uncover the history of the game world, revealing new aspects and plot twists. If you enjoy shooters and want to experience an unforgettable gaming process based on original mechanics, Drunk or Dead could be an ideal option for your entertainment. Maintaining combat readiness while controlling the level of intoxication adds a strategic element to the game, requiring players to balance between fun and efficiency in battle.

name: Drunk or Dead

package_groups.description: To be billed on a recurring basis.
package_groups.name: subscriptions

subs.option_description: $9.99 USD at checkout, auto-renewed every 1 month(s) at $9.99 USD.

package_groups.title: Buy Drunk or Dead Subscription Plan

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel® i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 970 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR or Oculus PC. Room Scale 2m by 1.5m area required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

reviews:
“Drunk or Dead isn’t a complex game, but it’s fun to play and could certainly earn its way into your rotation when showing off VR to friends and family.”
UPLOADVR

“4 I Lab has very cleverly taken a game we're all familiar with and tweaked it in a hilarious way.”
Pocket Gamer

“That’s a fun idea and I like it. Simple, silly, and sozzled.”
About Rock, Paper, Shotgun
short_description: Drunk or Dead is a fun party game. A virus has turned all sober people into zombies. Go bar hopping in the midst of the apocalypse! Drink in the company of survivors and finish off hordes of zombies! Set your own record!
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Russian, Japanese, Korean
*languages with full audio support
